bandaid.desc: ???: Do you not know what bandaids are? They can heal your wounds while in the midst of a heated battle.

disposable camera.desc: ???: A disposable camera. It's bright flash can blind your foes on the battlefield.

juice box.desc: ???: Replenishes must needed stamina. This one's cranberry flavor.

cigarette.desc: ???: I would tell you to hide this, but I don't think anyone actually cares. Eating it can remove unwanted effects while in a fight.

choccy milk.desc: ???: Do you not know what bandaids are? They can heal your wounds while in the midst of a heated battle.

soap bar.desc: ???: A pink soap bar. The suds make your enemies slippery and inaccurate.

shotakan scroll.desc: ???: This ancient scroll contains techniques passed down through generations of Shotokan warriors. It is no use to me anymore, for I have already mastered the art.
